alert.note: Alert for Dane; Green; Iowa; Lafayette (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 04 at 1:58PM CDT until July 04 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lafayette County in south central Wisconsin... Green County in south central Wisconsin... Southeastern Iowa County in south central Wisconsin... Southwestern Dane County in south central Wisconsin... * Until 245 PM CDT. * At 157 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Mount Horeb to near Cuba City, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Monroe, Brodhead, Darlington, New Glarus, Shullsburg, Monticello, Albany, Belmont, Benton, Argyle, Blanchardville, Apple River, Wiota, New Diggings, South Wayne, Waldwick, Elk Grove, Fayette, Lamont and Hollandale. This includes the following Location York Memorial Church. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
